text: Dreamer is a 1979 American sports drama movie directed by Noel Nosseck and starring Tim Matheson, Susan Blakely, Jack Warden, Owen Bush, Pedro Gonzalez Gonzalez, Morgan Farley. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 drama movies Category:1970s sports movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:American sports drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies set in Illinois Category:Movies set in Missouri
title: Dreamer (1979 movie)
